Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, my name is Jim, and I'm a Kerbal-holic... lol. 

I've been playing KSP on Steam for almost a year now, and I have to admit, I am seriously addicted. I don't need help learning the game or anything, I thikn I have everything figured out. I just wanted to start an account on this forum as well as one on Steam so I could stay up to date on things like upgrades. I'm very, very excited about version 1.1.... bring on the antenna's... antenni??? lol

Currently I'm in my 3rd year of a fantastic career game I started right after 1.0 was released. Had some issues when 1.0.4 came out, but survived without too many things exploding... lol. I now have space stations over Kerban, the Mun, and Minmus, and the Sun. And one currently headed to Ike. And I have bases on the Mun, Minmus and one headed to Duna. My fleet has survey platforms, shuttles, tourist landers, refueler/oredrillers and advanced science landers... lots of cool stuff. I will gladly share screenshots as soon as I figure out how to post them.

So anyway, I just wanted to say hello to y'all.
Hello back, Just Jim. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Welcome to the forum.
Hey Jim! Welcome to the forums, you will have an awesome time here. (Especially when interacting with others.)

Haha, I'm also very interested to see how the new comm satellites/dishes work out. Will change the feel of the game a bit (for probes and science anyway).

Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw
Welcome aboard, Jim! Looking forward to seeing what you've accomplished thus far. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Wow, thanks everyone.

Quick question: How do I post pictures? I have around 130 screenshots already uploaded to Steam, but I don't know if I can use them here.

Hi Jim! I'm Dman979, and I'm also an addict. But I've been sober for 2 or 3 months. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

To post a picture:

1. Create an imgur account.

2. Download any screenshots you would like to post from Steam (If you already have them, ignore this step.)

3. Go back to Imgur and upload the photos.

4. Make the photos appear on the forums!

a. Insert an album

- find your image's album number.
- go to the KSP forums and type your post.
- insert [noparse]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/YOUR)

[/noparse]
- watch your album appear!

b. Insert a photo

- Find the image you want to post
- highlight its URL and copy it to your clipboard
- type up your post and insert [noparse]![URL GOES HERE](URL%20GOES%20HERE)[/noparse]
- look at the pretty photo!

Welcome Jim! I've been struggling with my kerbal-holism for some time, I assure you that it is controllable. Best of luck with your future missions!

By the way, are you an Ajax or PSV fan? Or neither?

OK, I started an Imgur account... let's try this out:

![OZBtIUM.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/OZBtIUM.jpg)

Oh cool, it worked the first time!!!

OK, so I've whittled it down to only about 50 screenshots I want to share... lol... should I do it here or start a new post of my career game?

I would start a new report ub tge Nussuib Teoits sectuib

I mean "I would start a new report in the "Mission Reports" Section." I can't type on a keyboard while not looking at it. LOL.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> Hi Jim! I'm Dman979, and I'm also an addict. But I've been sober for 2 or 3 months. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> 2. Download any screenshots you would like to post from Steam (If you already have them, ignore this step.)
> 
> 3. Go back to Imgur and upload the photos.
> 
> 4. Make the photos appear on the forums!

> - go to the KSP forums and type your post.
> - insert [noparse][http://imgur.com/a/YOUR ALBUM CODE HERE](http://imgur.com/a/YOUR)[/noparse]
> - watch your album appear!
>

>

> - highlight its URL and copy it to your clipboard
> - type up your post and insert [noparse][URL GOES HERE](URL)[/noparse]
> - look at the pretty photo!

OK, I made an album. Posting pictures are easy, but I'm not finding an Album Code anywhere

OK, I just made my mission report. Here's the link if anyone wants to check it out:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130318-Moonkricket-Space-Agency-and-interplanetary-tourism-center?p=2113272&posted=1#post2113272](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130318-Moonkricket-Space-Agency-and-interplanetary-tourism-center?p=2113272&posted=1#post2113272)

So, this is an album I made a while ago. To find the album code

1. Open up your album
2. Look at the URL
3. Copy and paste the last letters and numbers from it. For mine, I start with [noparse][http://imgur.com/a/nb4a4#0](http://imgur.com/a/nb4a4#0)[/noparse]. I look at the last letters and numbers and get "nb4a4#0"
4. Remove the "#0" from the code. I get "nb4a4."
5. type [noparse]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/AlBUM)

[/noparse]. I get [noparse]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/nb4a4)

[/noparse]
6. Enjoy!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/nb4a4)

Hey Jim! Welcome to the Club! or space club. Or the Forums. whichever.

BTW, nice Lander. no design that i can imagine

> 
> So, this is an album I made a while ago. To find the album code

> 1. Open up your album
> 2. Look at the URL
> 3. Copy and paste the last letters and numbers from it. For mine, I start with [noparse][http://imgur.com/a/nb4a4#0](http://imgur.com/a/nb4a4#0)[/noparse]. I look at the last letters and numbers and get "nb4a4#0"
> 4. Remove the "#0" from the code. I get "nb4a4."
> 5. type [noparse][http://imgur.com/a/AlBUM CODE](http://imgur.com/a/AlBUM)[/noparse]. I get [noparse][http://imgur.com/a/nb4a4](http://imgur.com/a/nb4a4)[/noparse]
> 6. Enjoy!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [http://imgur.com/a/nb4a4](http://imgur.com/a/nb4a4)

Ahhh, fantastic! I thought that might be the number you meant, but I would have screwed up the zero... lol. Thanks!

- - - Updated - - -

OK, let's try this. Hopefully, this will be my album showing up

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/BtM6L)

- - - Updated - - -

Oh cool, there it is!!! Thanks again Dman!!!!!!
